website_summaries.verdict: A fine budget electric razor, and while it doesn’t come with the accessories or extended runtime of pricier models, it will consistently provide a smooth and reliable shave.
pros: Head contours and pivots for a closer shave
cons: Getting 40 minutes of runtime from an electric razor is underwhelming

customer_reviews.title: This is trash and CHINA made piece of crack
customer_reviews.text: It stop working couple months ago, trash, waste of money, bad MADE IN CHINA quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Zheng

customer_reviews.title: I usually love Remington rotary shavers however this model has a different ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually love Remington rotary shavers however this model has a different screen pattern that includes holes instead of slots so it takes a lot longer to shave. As a 30 year user of this style shaver I will say the slots that lift and cut are the only thing anyone should look for when shopping this style shaver. Stay away from the gimmicks that include holes and different screen patterns, simple slots are best.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Short cutter life
customer_reviews.text: I like that this razor is easy to hold on to, easy to clean, and easy to shave with. I've had it 3 months and the cutters are dull. I guess I expect them to last more than 3 months. I usually charge this about twice a week. It gets noticeably slower on the 3rd useage. My net step is to go back to razors. The cutting life of these doesn't justify the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as an all-over shaver, thinking maybe I could stop my monthly razor subscription and end the war against razor burn at the same time. NOPE. It only works on my legs - barely - and anywhere else (armpits, etc), I end up with cuts. Shaving my legs with it takes f o r e v e r because I have to go over the same area repeatedly before it gets all the hair. The trimmer is a menace all on its own, don’t even get me started. This is garbage. I give up.
customer_reviews.author: Alanya

customer_reviews.title: Aweful product.
customer_reviews.text: I've had these before and they were ok but this last one that I returned really messed up my face, it left my face irritated and red unlike the previous Remington shavers I had of the same type, I'm very dissapointed and dissatisfied with this shaver.
customer_reviews.author: greengoose

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: I won't give something five stars unless it's outstanding. That said this clearly warrants 4 1/2 stars as it is completely functional, reliable and very inexpensive. At this time I don't see any downside to this product other than its potential lifespan which I won't know for several months
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Hurts. Doesn’t give a close shave AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Hurts to use dry or wet. It’s pulls at the hair especially under the nose. Threw it away. Stick to a razor Originally bought cos my girlfriends love stubble and that rugged manly look, but this things sucks so bad I went back to the razor for a clean shave. And my many girlfriends still always come back for more.... What can I say, women love William Wallace...
customer_reviews.author: William Wallace

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed in this shaver
customer_reviews.text: My husband has owned several Remington shaver and had excellent results with them. Bought this one thinking it was a good one. Could not even tell he had shaved when he used this one. May try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Helton

customer_reviews.title: Nearly like the older Remington Shaver
customer_reviews.text: The shave is clean and easy. It seems it's better to slide lightly rather than press down as I had to do. The charger green light doesn't go off when the recharge is complete but it does shine yellow when it needs recharge. Razor is slightly lighter than my previous model and surprisingly the Amazon price is less than the razor I purchased 5 years ago. I don't like the stubble appearance but for others who do will find the free stubble attachment to work like a charm. You can't go wrong with the R3000 Razor BuddyBanks
customer_reviews.author: BuddyBanks

customer_reviews.title: Could not charge!
customer_reviews.text: The charger stopped working in less than 2 months. Returned the item.
customer_reviews.author: ASA-

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Zeros stars if I could! Did a horrible job of trimming even a day's worth of stubble. Pulled, and was very painful to use. Also it missed a lot. PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric W.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: The battery does not last but a few shaves. There is no indicator for a charged battery, just a stupid green light that stays on. Lastly, out of nowhere it stopped working...nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Outback buck

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T LAST
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for 4 months and then quit cutting. Used for shaving by an 82 year old man. He thinks the little plastic things that turn the blades have just worn off. Not made good. Don't see anything about a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing

customer_reviews.title: Good Item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift item. Works well, holds a charge for a good while. Cordless use after charging is a plus for the recipient. Excellent Value.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Rector

customer_reviews.title: Works great !!!.
customer_reviews.text: Shaver arrived in good condition in a timely manner. Works great,no problems. Love the stubble attachment !!!. Although charging for 16 hrs to get 40 minutes of use is a bit concerning.Could last a bit longer maybe a total of an hour(20 more minutes) after all that charge time. Not ideal but workable.As it is a Remington,I expect no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph White

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and close.
customer_reviews.text: Great razor for the money. Provides a close shave. Powerful motor. I like the stubble attachment. Takes a long time to charge - no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: LOW cost and excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have used Remington razors for 60 years. This one may be their best ever. Cuts fast and close.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Aona

customer_reviews.title: Best Electric Razor
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Cordless Electric Razor I tried and it's the best! I had to return the others (from different manufacturers).
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: It's OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: It shaves fine, though it feels cheap (which it was), is pretty noisy, and has a fairly short charge life. That said, I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: JimV

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I had a remington rotary head shaver and the blades needed replacing after 5 years of every day use. The cost of the blades are as much as this new razor. Bought the whole thing. Works great and battery holds charge forever.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Joe

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD CLOSE SHAVE
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT , GIVES A STRAIGHT RAZOR LIKE SHAVE. GOOD CLOSENESS.
customer_reviews.author: XANADUE

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time and had to go over my face with it at least 3-4 times to remove the hair and it still didn't get it all! Had to use a regular razor to get the rest! Very disappointed! Bought this for nothing i guess because it is useless!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grandson's first razor
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something easy to use and maintain without spending a lot. This fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: V. L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good shave for the money
customer_reviews.text: Hey they're not the best shave I've had, but for the price I'm not complaining. I've used this brand and model (well close the the same model) for many years now, and I have always found them to be reliable and good performance.
customer_reviews.author: Dann D

customer_reviews.title: Good Father's Day gift
customer_reviews.text: Good Father's Day gift. My dad loved it and it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Julia R. Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Good Value!  Lots of shaves off of one charge
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat this razor . . . forget about those USB products; they all have to be recharged way too often
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hofmann

customer_reviews.title: Great razor
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap razor. I had low expectations but am very happy with how it’s been performing.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp!! The back clippers can cut a line in your eyebrows smoothly and professionally!
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: It's Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is not a great product. Clearly cheaply made. I had a similar product in the past, but this one is not as good. I've had problems with the On/Off switch since I go it. Blade quality is no better than fair. This will be a "throw away" soon. Next time I'll spend more for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with the purchased item. A good remington electric razor!
customer_reviews.author: Louis

customer_reviews.title: good bargain
customer_reviews.text: works very well, even for lazy people like me who only shave every three days.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Buckridge

customer_reviews.title: Does what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad razor for the price. I did not need one with a lot of bells and whistles. Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but sometimes pulls hair out
customer_reviews.text: It's alright. Tends to pull some hairs on though. Still prefer a straight edge razor or double bladed safety razor
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver bargain.
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver. I bought it to replace my five year old Remington. Having no desire to have that homeless person look, I immediately pitched the stubble attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Owens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my boyfriend because he had broke his other one. This is the only razor he loves and he says it works the best out of any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Emma W.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Very weak. Even after a full charge. Won't buy again. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Awats28

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I shave my head with it, works better that “Bald Eagle” that cost twice as much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A shaver blazer
customer_reviews.text: Great shaver, saw couple of bad reviews, those people are wrong. Use it, works for me price d right
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Fries

customer_reviews.title: Worked well while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to clean; not durable. Just quit working after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: David Neyland

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver and great price
customer_reviews.text: Great 1st shaver for my teeneage son! Will order one for my husband now too!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: This item died after about a month of using it. My husband plugged it in yet it would not hold a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Makin

customer_reviews.title: cuts
customer_reviews.text: I have been shaving for the last 73 yrs. and this Razor is the worst!
customer_reviews.author: calvin bouma

customer_reviews.title: Best electric razor and quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth shave. Works very well. Best electric razor I have ever used. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Refuses to charge after two uses.
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on this product was poor, lasting only a few days, then refusing to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Branford

customer_reviews.title: one year old
customer_reviews.text: this razor works great, no problems at all. will buy another anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Irving L.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and has been around for some time
customer_reviews.text: Love this razor, my wife accidentally threw away my old one. I know I love this model so I didn’t bother trying to find another one that I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: All good but no charge cord
customer_reviews.text: There was no charge cord in the package or in the box the razor came in
customer_reviews.author: Bill peloquin

customer_reviews.title: shave it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: nice shave for such a cheap price get one u like it
customer_reviews.author: goldboy22

customer_reviews.title: Pros... if your looking for a cheap ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros...if your looking for a cheap razor this one will do. Cons...battery doesn't last very many shaves, have to repeat shaving the same areas to get a close shave, razor head is noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I Like how fast balde are to cut my bear thanos alots
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not high quality in terms of shaving performance or the way it is built...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not sharp
customer_reviews.text: razor wasn't sharp, open it up and the blades just fall out, not a good razor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: es for good close cut
customer_reviews.text: Ok...cuts kinda poorly. Must go,over multiple ti,es for good close cut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that so much of the machine was made out of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: My face felt like it was on fire all day
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for!!! This ripped my beard off the first time I used it. My face felt like it was on fire all day. It didn't feel like a even shave. If you buy it make sure you know your not getting a storage stand. Spend more money and get something good.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: it sucks!! husband hates it. Says the travel one for $15 has a better shave. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: It feels shaky in the hand and not of good quality. It in a bit noisy I can ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shaver and it is not what I had expected at all. It feels shaky in the hand and not of good quality. It in a bit noisy I can hear the inner parts shaking when I move my hand around. It shaves relatively close and clean. Honestly I do not like it. I had bought another model (  ) before but it got stolen. I got this other one thinking it might be better but I was so wrong. I should have bought back the old model I had before. The  is far better to me than this one. Spend the extra money and get a better shave. :-(
customer_reviews.author: St. Clair Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ok - cheap price - cheap quality - usable
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's nothing special this razor. It is light and has a cheap feel. But it works. Caution with it because it is not very sophisticated and therefore can cause abrasions. For the money I have however no complaint. Let's see how long it holds up. Easy clean? not, not very. But good enough. Again for the money it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Consumerman

customer_reviews.title: Contaminated!! Total rip off! Do not waste your money!!
customer_reviews.text: Can't even get a small amount of hair shaven before this hunk of garbage tries to eat my face. After leaving multiple circular shaped cuts along my face, I decided to open it up and see if it was some how clogged, only to find a ton of hair that doesn't belong to me in the chamber! I bought this product "new from manufacturer" or so I was lead to believe. Could not get internet access for six weeks and I am now stuck with a contaminated piece of trash. Never ordering from this manufacturer again unless they somehow make it right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeans

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor to replace my previous one, which is the same model. The old one lasted about five years with no problems at all. But it was losing its cutting ability, and a replacement head was almost as much as an entirely new razor, so I bought a new razor. I see no reason to pay more.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Husband only uses Remington products and he had this shaver for 5 months before the top part fell off and can't be fixed. We contacted Remington to see if they'll exchange it for another one, but it's strange that the last two shavers like this have fallen apart....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a Close Shave
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these shavers for my 3 Daughters and one for myself for Mothers Day. My Daughters seemed very happy and satisfied. I tried mine today. It is terrible. Not a close shave and pulls hair. I was using my hand shaver but decided to use it today. Very unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy from Shirley NY

customer_reviews.title: Low battery life
customer_reviews.text: This razor does not have any indicator as to when it needs to be charged. It just stops in the middle of a cut. The device last about a weeks-worth of daily shaves (about 15 minutes - at best). I would NEVER take it traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S. Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit loud! But it does shave well. So far so good! Had it about a week.
customer_reviews.author: 1dervol

customer_reviews.title: You will love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Remington shaver ever. Shaved right down to skin without irritating Also it cuts the wild hairs on next without endless do overs
customer_reviews.author: nick stone

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL-- terrible shave
customer_reviews.text: I bought this razor and new heads for my norelco from Malaysia at the same time. The OLD norelco with new heads 10 times better,
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R. Hamby

customer_reviews.title: A hugh disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product...maybe i just expected a better razor...for some it may work for me not so much...
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Cordless razor
customer_reviews.text: This razor is great had older one and used this one as replacement I love it great quality for the price..
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gibson

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just completed my second day of use. So far the shaver is performing flawlessly. Can't speak to the longevity but Remington has been around for a long time and I expect this shaver to last.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell W. Truitt

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Has a problem with pulling whiskers ever once in awhile other wise not bad
customer_reviews.author: Irishman

customer_reviews.title: Did not like
customer_reviews.text: Pulls whiskers rather than cuts. There are much better razors out there.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheap and light, does not shave evenly or close. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas M. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Remington should be ashamed to put their name on this garbage
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Painful shave, not effective and battery life is poor. Blades are dull on first use. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Very vise
customer_reviews.text: Yes im a girl i use it on my sides of head smooth as a babys butt.
customer_reviews.author: 🐾Susie Wade🐾

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Value. Great Shave! Why buy anything else!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shaver. Will last for years. Close Shave. fast charge> Great charge hold.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth finish
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t exactly what I was looking for but does work great
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Wright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, my son is happy with it. Got it for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: xtina

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last long, doubt if it ever fully charged. After a couple of uses, died. Get what you pay for, I guess. Not worth retuning.
customer_reviews.author: sfrenchfl

customer_reviews.title: I buy everything on Amazon. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Product has no battery life. Seller was not nice to me
customer_reviews.author: Mike Drake

customer_reviews.title: Cuts well
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well and you can replace it with a new one every year for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Smathers

customer_reviews.title: How can I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this razor for my husband on 2/21/2018 and he used it everyday until yesterday(5/5/18) and was dead.Lite indicated it was charged and is still dead.Return and replacement is expired. 2 1/2 months and it is useless.What do I do now?

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and does just as good a job as the more expensive models.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and does just as good a job as the more expensive models.

customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son, he seems to be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: New item? I think it was used!
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like this was previously used. I returned it because instead of giving my husband a nice clean shave, it gave him a rash and pulled hairs because the blade was so dull!

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves it. Works great and holds a charge. It came fast as well.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shaver; I use it to shave my head NICK FREE.

product_meta.title: Remington PR1335B R3000 Series Men's Electric Razor with Precision Plus Heads, Stubble Attachment Included, Black
product_meta.description: Find out what makes a great shave with the REMINGTON R3000 Series Rotary Shaver. The PrecisionPlus Heads capture long hairs and short stubble, and the Twintrack blades stay in close contact with skin to help prevent irritation and deliver a fast shaving experience. You get two great styles from one shaver with the included stubble attachment. It snaps onto the shaver head and creates a stubble that will enhance your look. The special antimicrobial additive helps inhibit the growth of bacteria for a clean shave. And you get the convenience of cordless with the rechargeable battery, good for up to 40 minutes of runtime with every full charge. *vs. Norelco Series 1000 **More than previous Remington model
feature_bullets: PrecisionPlus Heads – Shaves Long Hairs and Short Stubble
Twintrack Blades – 2X More Tracks* for Maximum Skin Contact
Active Contour – More Contour** for a Close Shave on the Neck and Chin
Rechargeable Battery – Up to 40 Minutes Cordless Runtime
Stubble Attachment Included for 2 Great Styles from 1 Amazing Shaver

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
